articles.author: Stella Qiu
articles.title: Asian shares hesitant on China deflation risk, bank jitters - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares were on the defensive on Wednesday after data showed that China slipped into deflation in July, a negative sign for the world economic growth outlook although it could help dampen on inflationary forces globally.
articles.content: SYDNEY, Aug 9 (Reuters) - Asian shares were on the defensive on Wednesday after data showed that China slipped into deflation in July, a negative sign for the world economic growth outlook although i… [+4008 chars]

articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets mixed as threat of China deflation grows - CNBC
articles.description: China's July inflation rate fell 0.3% in July, while its producer price index slumped 4.4%.
articles.content:
Stocks in China and Hong Kong fell Wednesday as China's consumer prices slipped into negative territory in July, for the first time in 28 months.
